5 bool EsdfMap::getDistanceAtPosition(const Eigen::Vector3d& position,
6  double* distance) const {
7  constexpr bool interpolate = true;
8  return getDistanceAtPosition(position, interpolate, distance);
9 }
10 
11 bool EsdfMap::getDistanceAtPosition(const Eigen::Vector3d& position,
12  bool interpolate, double* distance) const {
13  FloatingPoint distance_fp;
14  bool success = interpolator_.getDistance(position.cast<FloatingPoint>(),
15  &distance_fp, interpolate);
16  if (success) {
17  *distance = static_cast<double>(distance_fp);
18  }
19  return success;
20 }
21 
22 bool EsdfMap::getDistanceAndGradientAtPosition(
23  const Eigen::Vector3d& position, double* distance,
24  Eigen::Vector3d* gradient) const {
25  constexpr bool interpolate = true;
26  return getDistanceAndGradientAtPosition(position, interpolate, distance,
27  gradient);
28 }
29 
30 bool EsdfMap::getDistanceAndGradientAtPosition(
31  const Eigen::Vector3d& position, bool interpolate, double* distance,
32  Eigen::Vector3d* gradient) const {
33  FloatingPoint distance_fp = 0.0;
34  Point gradient_fp = Point::Zero();
35  bool use_adaptive = false;
36  bool success = false;
37  if (use_adaptive) {
38  success = interpolator_.getAdaptiveDistanceAndGradient(
39  position.cast<FloatingPoint>(), &distance_fp, &gradient_fp);
40  } else {
41  success = interpolator_.getDistance(position.cast<FloatingPoint>(),
42  &distance_fp, interpolate);
43  success &= interpolator_.getGradient(position.cast<FloatingPoint>(),
44  &gradient_fp, interpolate);
45  }
46 
47  *distance = static_cast<double>(distance_fp);
48  *gradient = gradient_fp.cast<double>();
49 
50  return success;
51 }
52 
53 bool EsdfMap::isObserved(const Eigen::Vector3d& position) const {
54  // Get the block.
55  Block<EsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr =
56  esdf_layer_->getBlockPtrByCoordinates(position.cast<FloatingPoint>());
57  if (block_ptr) {
58  const EsdfVoxel& voxel =
59  block_ptr->getVoxelByCoordinates(position.cast<FloatingPoint>());
60  return voxel.observed;
61  }
62  return false;
63 }
64 
65 // NOTE(mereweth@jpl.nasa.gov) - this function is a convenience function for
66 // Python bindings. std::exceptions are bound to Python exceptions by pybind11,
67 // allowing them to be handled in Python code idiomatically.
68 void EsdfMap::batchGetDistanceAtPosition(
69  EigenDRef<const Eigen::Matrix<double, 3, Eigen::Dynamic>>& positions,
70  Eigen::Ref<Eigen::VectorXd> distances,
71  Eigen::Ref<Eigen::VectorXi> observed) const {
72  if (distances.size() < positions.cols()) {
73  throw std::runtime_error("Distances array smaller than number of queries");
74  }
75 
76  if (observed.size() < positions.cols()) {
77  throw std::runtime_error("Observed array smaller than number of queries");
78  }
79 
80  for (int i = 0; i < positions.cols(); i++) {
81  observed[i] = getDistanceAtPosition(positions.col(i), &distances[i]);
82  }
83 }
84 
85 // NOTE(mereweth@jpl.nasa.gov) - this function is a convenience function for
86 // Python bindings. std::exceptions are bound to Python exceptions by pybind11,
87 // allowing them to be handled in Python code idiomatically.
88 void EsdfMap::batchGetDistanceAndGradientAtPosition(
89  EigenDRef<const Eigen::Matrix<double, 3, Eigen::Dynamic>>& positions,
90  Eigen::Ref<Eigen::VectorXd> distances,
91  EigenDRef<Eigen::Matrix<double, 3, Eigen::Dynamic>>& gradients,
92  Eigen::Ref<Eigen::VectorXi> observed) const {
93  if (distances.size() < positions.cols()) {
94  throw std::runtime_error("Distances array smaller than number of queries");
95  }
96 
97  if (observed.size() < positions.cols()) {
98  throw std::runtime_error("Observed array smaller than number of queries");
99  }
100 
101  if (gradients.cols() < positions.cols()) {
102  throw std::runtime_error("Gradients matrix smaller than number of queries");
103  }
104 
105  for (int i = 0; i < positions.cols(); i++) {
106  Eigen::Vector3d gradient;
107  observed[i] = getDistanceAndGradientAtPosition(positions.col(i),
108  &distances[i], &gradient);
109 
110  gradients.col(i) = gradient;
111  }
112 }
113 
114 // NOTE(mereweth@jpl.nasa.gov) - this function is a convenience function for
115 // Python bindings. std::exceptions are bound to Python exceptions by pybind11,
116 // allowing them to be handled in Python code idiomatically.
117 void EsdfMap::batchIsObserved(
118  EigenDRef<const Eigen::Matrix<double, 3, Eigen::Dynamic>>& positions,
119  Eigen::Ref<Eigen::VectorXi> observed) const {
120  if (observed.size() < positions.cols()) {
121  throw std::runtime_error("Observed array smaller than number of queries");
122  }
123 
124  for (int i = 0; i < positions.cols(); i++) {
125  observed[i] = isObserved(positions.col(i));
126  }
127 }
128 
129 unsigned int EsdfMap::coordPlaneSliceGetDistance(
130  unsigned int free_plane_index, double free_plane_val,
131  EigenDRef<Eigen::Matrix<double, 3, Eigen::Dynamic>>& positions,
132  Eigen::Ref<Eigen::VectorXd> distances, unsigned int max_points) const {
133  BlockIndexList blocks;
134  esdf_layer_->getAllAllocatedBlocks(&blocks);
135 
136  // Cache layer settings.
137  size_t vps = esdf_layer_->voxels_per_side();
138  size_t num_voxels_per_block = vps * vps * vps;
139 
140  // Temp variables.
141  bool did_all_fit = true;
142  unsigned int count = 0;
143 
144  // TODO(mereweth@jpl.nasa.gov) - store min/max index (per axis) allocated in
145  // Layer This extra bookeeping will make this much faster
146  for (const BlockIndex& index : blocks) {
147  // Iterate over all voxels in said blocks.
148  const Block<EsdfVoxel>& block = esdf_layer_->getBlockByIndex(index);
149 
150  Point origin = block.origin();
151  if (std::abs(origin(free_plane_index) - free_plane_val) >
152  block.block_size()) {
153  continue;
154  }
155 
156  for (size_t linear_index = 0; linear_index < num_voxels_per_block;
157  ++linear_index) {
158  Point coord = block.computeCoordinatesFromLinearIndex(linear_index);
159  const EsdfVoxel& voxel = block.getVoxelByLinearIndex(linear_index);
160  if (std::abs(coord(free_plane_index) - free_plane_val) <=
161  block.voxel_size()) {
162  double distance;
163  if (voxel.observed) {
164  distance = voxel.distance;
165  } else {
166  continue;
167  }
168 
169  if (count < positions.cols()) {
170  positions.col(count) =
171  Eigen::Vector3d(coord.x(), coord.y(), coord.z());
172  } else {
173  did_all_fit = false;
174  }
175  if (count < distances.size()) {
176  distances(count) = distance;
177  } else {
178  did_all_fit = false;
179  }
180  count++;
181  if (count >= max_points) {
182  return count;
183  }
184  }
185  }
186  }
187 
188  if (!did_all_fit) {
189  throw std::runtime_error(std::string("Unable to store ") +
190  std::to_string(count) + " values.");
191  }
192 
193  return count;
194 }
195
